Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier minor fire on the tracks at Harlem (Forest Park Branch). Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier minor fire at the track level near Harlem (Forest Park Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
